attributes.action: look into liquid fluoride reactors, and their potential for supplying our energy needs.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If this video is to be believed, liquid fluoride reactors are much safer, cheaper, and more efficient than conventional nuclear reactors.

If they can be made to work, they could supply all of Britain’s electricity for the next thousand years, and the technology and expertise could be exported throughout the world.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WWUeBSoEnRk&sn

Worth a look.
